name: Bad Caterpillar
description: Bad Caterpillars and their swarms of insect hordes are invading. Get to your ship, man the lasers, and save the galaxy from caterpillars, scorpions, spiders, and a slew of other ill-tempered giant killer insects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game hits all the marks I was looking for in a game of this style. If you are interested in arcade shooters and games like centipede, I highly recommend buying this. The controls are tight(played on 360 controller), the power-ups are cool, and the sounds bring back memories.  Plus, it's a very budget title...and.. it includes an online leaderboard, which is such a great bonus. Challenge your friends or even compete for the high score on Steam.  If you would like to see my quick one minute review of this game, here is a link...         YouTubeâ„¢ Video:
Love this game. It's nostalgic and, admittedly, highly addicting. I would highly recommend.
